Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
divs: sighting detailsi was searching for any simular reports of an object that i saw on 10-10-2012. i came across an exact sighting of what i saw and i have the video of it. below is the case\log number of the sighting that matches what i observed. case number: 42814 log number: us-09252012-0009 as discribed by the observer in the case and log number above i also had the same plane which at times i wasn't sure who was following who. after i stopped taking video so i could try and follow the object the plane turned sharply toward the silver object. the object began to increase in speed until i could no longer see it. the object i saw was in parsippany, nj. i pulled over and took video from my cellular phone in amazement. i observed the object when it was a little closer prior to taking the video. this object was thick and solid and not a piece of floating trash. also at the time the video was taken there was little or no wind.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Parsippany-Troy Hills
There were no other sightings in Parsippany-Troy Hills on or around October 10th 2012
Summary: Left work and saw object during commute home. Pulled off highway to take video of event until object was to far.
